thag2.47:5.1: The conceited mind, addicted to pleasure,
thag2.47:5.2: impales itself on its own stake.
thag2.47:5.4: there’s a stake, a chopping block.
thag2.47:6.1: I declare you the demon mind!

thag2.47:6.3: You’ve found the teacher so hard to find—
